name: Save Frank
description:
Buggy, Frank and Jane Doe are in need of memory operation. connect the pieces as you see them in the first 3 seconds and do the operation.

The game was made by: 

Programmers :@MagoMerdino @Nine @Typhereus

Artist @yung.kalu @Muhvu @aloeojirae @Matryoshka 

Game Design: @kenobien and @muhvu

Audio: @Darius
